user.title: Solar AC Controller setup
user.description:
Configure how the controller manages your AC zones based on solar production and grid usage.

Tip: Select zones in the order you want them activated. All settings can be adjusted later from Options.

Supports cooling and heating zones (heat / cool / on).

data_description.ac_power_sensor: Sensor that reports the AC unit's current power draw.
data_description.outside_temperature_sensor: Optional outside temperature for auto season and banded learning.
data_description.ac_switch: Optional switch that powers the AC system. Leave empty if unmanaged.
data_description.zones: List of climate or switch entities to control. Order determines activation priority.
data_description.initial_learned_power: Starting estimate of zone power before learning.
data_description.solar_threshold_on: Solar must exceed this to enable the AC master switch.
data_description.solar_threshold_off: Solar must fall below this to disable the master switch.
data_description.heat_on_below: Auto season: enable heating when outside is below this.
data_description.heat_off_above: Auto season: stop heating when outside rises above this.
data_description.cool_on_above: Auto season: enable cooling when outside is above this.
data_description.cool_off_below: Auto season: stop cooling when outside falls below this.
data_description.band_cold_max: Outside temperature upper bound for 'cold' band.
data_description.enable_auto_season: Automatically choose heat/cool/neutral from outside temp.
data_description.enable_temperature_modulation: Use temperature-aware setpoint modulation when indoor temps are available.
data_description.master_off_in_neutral: Turn master switch off when neutral (no heating/cooling needed).
data_description.panic_threshold: If grid import exceeds this, zones are shed.
data_description.manual_lock_seconds: When a user manually changes a zone, it is locked for this duration.
data_description.short_cycle_on_seconds: Minimum time a zone must stay ON before turning OFF.
data_description.short_cycle_off_seconds: Minimum time a zone must stay OFF before turning ON.
data_description.add_confidence: Minimum confidence required to add a new zone.
data_description.remove_confidence: Minimum negative confidence required to remove a zone.

init.title: Solar AC Controller options
init.description:
Adjust sensors, zones, thresholds, seasons, and safety settings.

Zone order determines activation priority. Panic settings protect your inverter from overload.
